home.description: Scroll down to learn more about my background and expertise.

about.greeting: I'm a highly driven software engineer with a strong background in full-stack development, mobile app creation, and UI/UX design. I'm experienced in React Native, JavaScript frameworks, and backend technologies. I'm passionate about creating innovative solutions, including decentralized systems and applications. I'm always seeking to deepen my expertise in emerging technologies, with a focus on blockchain and scalable, secure software architectures.

esprit.title: Software Engineering Degree
esprit.desc: Currently studying in a computer engineering program, specializing in mobile application development. My journey has allowed me to work on complex projects, optimize applications, and solve technical problems in various development environments.

esen.title: Bachelor's Degree in Applied Computer Science for Management
esen.desc: In 2023, I obtained a bachelor's degree in applied computer science for management, specializing in information systems, which provided me with a solid foundation in computer science, programming, database management, and computer networks.
